name: SpellingGamebyMagoosh
0:
”Alexa, start the spelling game”
”Alexa, launch Spelling Game”
”Alexa, open Spelling Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spelling game
des:
Magoosh Spelling Game is a fun, turn-based spelling game, where you can learn definitions and practice spelling 250+ GRE-level words. It's created by Magoosh test prep, an online company dedicated to providing students with fun and helpful educational materials.

Just ask, "Alexa, launch the spelling game", and she'll ask if you want to start the game. She'll give you a word and you will then spell the word together, alternating letters. For example, she might say something like this:

"The word is choleric. It means 'prone to outbursts of temper; easily angered'. The first letter is 'c'. What is the next letter?"

You would then respond with 'h', and she would continue with 'o', and you would continue with 'l', and so on. Don't worry if you get a letter wrong! She'll ask you to repeat your answer in case she misheard you. If you get it wrong 3 times, Alexa will give you the correct letter and ask if you want to either start the word over or move on to a new word. And that's it! Have fun!

Please leave any feedback below, constructive or positive, and we'll do our best to make this skill better for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
